text:
💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash Closed Beta Has Come to an End! 📢

Thank you for all the love and excitement you shared during the beta! 💓
We’re taking all your amazing feedback to make the game even more fun and unforgettable. ✨

There’s so much more in store for OvenSmash, so stay https://t.co/S8mfSg71dH

💥Cookie Run: Oven Smash CBT Survey Event D-1📢

⏰ Only one day left until the deadline! 

We need your valuable feedback to make a better 💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash!

📋 Every survey participant will receive an in-game currency prize worth $6 USD🎁
✨ 5 survey respondent winners https://t.co/A662scGLg8

💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash 🏆 Creator Cup — Match Highlights! ❤️‍🔥

24 creators from around the world brought the heat, and the moment of victory went to Team Zizon BonKim from Faction Lactose!

Don’t miss the best plays, clutch moments, and epic highlights.
Watch the full recap and https://t.co/MgMx9QYM5l

💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash – Special Livestream 📺 with Mic Mac

🔥 To celebrate the heat of the action in CookieRun: OvenSmash, we’ve got a special live broadcast coming your way featuring Mic Mac! 🎤

Jump into Platter City and experience the thrill of Cookie battles in real time! https://t.co/0nX5upSHKj

🥓 #JerkyCookie Joins the Fight in Platter City!

Did you grab Jerky Cookie from today's login reward?
🎁 We just dropped bonus Soulchips into your mailbox!

Hop into Platter City now and bring the heat with Jerky Cookie! 🔥

#CookieRun #CookieRunOvenSmash https://t.co/7m5HdqEX3m

🏆 Creator Cup Winning Faction: Lactose!
🎯 Prediction Event Results & Reward Info
✅ All Participants: 30 Rare Potions + 1,000 Coins
✅ Successful Predictors: 30 Epic Potions + 1,000 Coins
📅 Reward Date: 4/27 (Sat) / Check your mailbox in the CBT build
※ Rewards are https://t.co/RPfuelFy6y

The Creator Cup livestream is starting soon! 🔥 Let’s smash it up! 💥

🔴 Tune in here: https://t.co/NaOsLEUVXP 

#CookieRun #CookieRunKingdom https://t.co/qPbCAS1Wsu

💥CookieRun: OvenSmash 🏆 Creator Cup is TODAY❤️‍🔥

24 creators from around the world will compete in a LIVE competition soon!  🔥

🍓Cafe Fruit Bomber, 🍖 Grinders, 🧀 Lactose, and 🎧DJ Miya!
🏙️Which of the four factions in Platter City will take the Oven Crown?

⏰ April 26, https://t.co/dYv2D1KXvv

💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash's First-Ever Global Showdown—The Creator Cup Begins! 🏆

8 top creator teams from around the world are going head-to-head in a battle you won't want to miss! 🔥

The Creator Cup kicks off tomorrow at 12:00 PM (GMT+9)!
🍓 Cafe Fruit Bomber, 🍖 The Grinders, https://t.co/L5A30lkAbO

The more the merrier! Play CookieRun: OvenSmash with your friends! 💥

🏆 Closed Beta Testers! 
We've sent 3 invitation codes to your email! 📩
Send the invitation codes to your besties! 🧑‍🤝‍🧑

"Please wait a moment for your codes to arrive in your inbox. 💕
※ The invitation codes https://t.co/MbJvBH4vTz

💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash Closed Beta Test Survey 📢

We need your opinions to make a more fun 💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash experience! ✍️

📋 Participate in the survey and receive a $6 USD participation prize 🎁
✨ Top 5 survey respondents will receive a $20 USD Google Play gift card! https://t.co/i5c32lUGiX

🎤 [Smash Talk Ep.4] 💥 TNMAX vs Team Tribe | Cookie VAs Join the Fight?! 👀

A showdown you never saw coming is unfolding at the Creator Cup! 💥

🇰🇷 Team TNMAX vs 🌍 Team Tribe
💯 1M-subscriber creator vs 🎙️ 3M-subscriber creator
🛡️ Madeleine Cookie VA vs 💪 Muscle Cookie VA?! https://t.co/2JjUnZ8uR8

💥 CookieRun: OvenSmash Closed Beta Test Guide 📢

To have MORE fun in CookieRun: OvenSmash, we've prepared some fun events! 🎮✨

✅ Most Matches Played / 5-Win Streak Challenge / Cookie Level-Up Challenge / Party Play / Login Challenge
📅 April 24 – April 30 (GMT+9)
※ To give https://t.co/qMzG7ZhZpu

💥CookieRun: OvenSmash Mode Spotlight - ⚔️SMASH ARENA

The ultimate test of pure skill and reflexes!
I've got all the details on ⚔️SMASH ARENA mode!

Split into two teams, battle it out, and the first to reach the target knockout count claims victory!

Team up for lightning-fast https://t.co/g5U0yHOxol

🏆 The Creator Cup factions are locked in!
🍓 Cafe Fruit Bomber, 🍖 The Grinders, 🧀 Lactose, and 🎧 DJ Miya's team!

Which side will take home the Creator Cup trophy? 👀
We’ve got awesome prizes 🎁 waiting for those who predict the winner correctly!

🔮 Think you’ve got what it https://t.co/kwsrurcoB7

🎤 [Smash Talk Ep.3] 💥 Brave Fellows vs Team Family | 🌍 The Global Team Has Landed!

💥 They flew all the way to Korea with one goal: win the Creator Cup.
Meet the global creators bringing the heat to CookieRun: OvenSmash! 🎮

🔥 Brave Fellows vs Team Family
Which team will https://t.co/OYcNDVFDMS

💥 The CookieRun: OvenSmash Closed Beta Begins NOW!

It's finally here!
🏙️ The gates to Platter City are open, and the race for glory is on!

#CookieRunOvenSmash #ClosedBeta #OvenSmash https://t.co/ux9Q96f8LO
